trans-unit.source: lets you configure behavior or attributes of a system, a specific database, or a specific conglomerate (a table or index) through the use of properties.

target.mrk: lets you configure behavior or attributes of a system, a specific database, or a specific conglomerate (a table or index) through the use of properties.
